alert.note: Alert for Box Elder; Davis; Tooele; Weber (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:58PM MDT until June 06 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weber County in northern Utah... Southern Box Elder County in northern Utah... Western Davis County in northern Utah... Northern Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 445 PM MDT * At 357 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Wendover to near Utah Test and Training Range North to near Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Utah Test and Training Range North, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Hat Island, Lakeside, Lucin, Gunnison Island and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 13 and 33, and between mile markers 59 and 66. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 19 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
